practice_phrases: Because.
因为。
Because I want.
因为我想要。
Because tomorrow is important.
因为明天很重要。
Because I am learning.
因为我在学。
Because she wants to meet.
因为她想见面。
Because he is coming back.
因为他在回来。
Because I want to speak Chinese.
因为我想要说中文。
Because she wants to find out the answer.
因为她想找出答案。
Because I want to meet at six o'clock this evening.
因为我想今天晚上六点见面。
Because he wants to come back with everyone else later.
因为他想晚点和其他人一起回来。

seed_context.known: 因为我想认识会说中文的人。
seed_context.target: Because I want to meet people who speak Chinese.

practice_phrases: I want to meet.
我想认识。
I want to meet you.
我想认识你。
I want to meet tomorrow.
我想明天认识。
I want to meet him quickly.
我想快点认识他。
I want to meet other people.
我想认识其他人。
I want to meet her this evening.
我想今天晚上认识她。
I want to meet people who speak very well.
我想认识说得很好的人。
I want to meet everyone else at six o'clock.
我想六点认识其他所有人。
I want to meet people who are learning together with me.
我想认识和我一起学的人。
I want to meet other people because I am learning Chinese.
我想认识其他人因为我在学中文。

seed_context.known: 因为我想认识会说中文的人。
seed_context.target: Because I want to meet people who speak Chinese.

lego: to meet people who speak Chinese
practice_phrases: To meet people who speak Chinese.
认识会说中文的人。
I want to meet people who speak Chinese.
我想认识会说中文的人。
She wants to meet people who speak Chinese.
她想认识会说中文的人。
To meet people who speak Chinese very well.
认识会说中文说得很好的人。
We want to meet people who speak Chinese.
我们想认识会说中文的人。
I'd like to meet people who speak Chinese tomorrow.
我想明天认识会说中文的人。
He wants to meet people who speak Chinese this evening.
他想今天晚上认识会说中文的人。
They want to meet people who speak Chinese all day together.
他们想整天一起认识会说中文的人。
I am learning because I want to meet people who speak Chinese.
我在学因为我想认识会说中文的人。
We want to meet people who speak Chinese with everyone else at six o'clock.
我们想六点和其他所有人认识会说中文的人。

seed_context.known: 因为我想认识会说中文的人。
seed_context.target: Because I want to meet people who speak Chinese.

practice_phrases: People who speak Chinese.
会说中文的人。
People who speak Chinese very well.
会说中文说得很好的人。
I know people who speak Chinese.
我知道会说中文的人。
People who speak Chinese all day.
整天都说中文的人。
She wants to meet people who speak Chinese.
她想认识会说中文的人。
People who speak Chinese are learning together.
会说中文的人在一起学。
I want to find people who speak Chinese tomorrow.
我想明天找到会说中文的人。
He wants to come back with people who speak Chinese later.
他想晚点和会说中文的人一起回来。
We are learning her name because she is one of the people who speak Chinese.
我们在学她的名字因为她是会说中文的人之一。
I'd like to meet people who speak Chinese at six o'clock this evening.
我想今天晚上六点认识会说中文的人。

seed_context.target: Because I want to meet people who speak Chinese.

practice_phrases: Can speak Chinese.
会说中文。
I can speak Chinese.
我会说中文。
She can speak Chinese very well.
她会说中文说得很好。
We can speak Chinese together.
我们会一起说中文。
He can speak Chinese all day.
他会整天都说中文。
They can speak Chinese with me tomorrow.
他们明天会和我说中文。
I can speak Chinese after you finish speaking.
我会在你说完之后说中文。
You can speak Chinese with other people this evening.
你今天晚上会和其他人说中文。
She can speak Chinese very well because she is learning quickly.
她会说中文说得很好因为她在快点学。
Because I want to meet people who speak Chinese.
因为我想认识会说中文的人。

seed_context.known: 因为我想认识会说中文的人。
seed_context.target: Because I want to meet people who speak Chinese.
